entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Uri does not allow * (or other sub-delims) in hostname #64707
  • Copy propagation needs to propagate variables, not values #64700
    7.0.0
  • ContentRootPath and appsettings.json behavior differences between worker and console app #64698
  • System.Net.Http.HttpClient cannot handle unencoded parentheses characters '(' or ')' in Header. #64694
  • TimeZoneInfo.HasIanaId returning false for an IANA timezone on App Service azure #64693
  • Question: difference between X509RevocationMode.Offline and X509RevocationMode.Online #64689
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add easyway possibility to replace a specific Implementation in ServiceCollection #64680
  • Make working with JSON and HTTP Requests easier #64676
  • [mono][arm6][linux] System.Reflection.Tests.ModuleTests.GetField failed #64675
  • [mono][arm6][linux] System.Net.Tests.ServicePointManagerTest.FindServicePoint_Collectible failed. #64674
  • [mono][arm6][linux] System.Net.Ping.Functional.Tests failed #64673
  • Difference in attribute handling by System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Validator.TryValidateObject between .net core 3.1 and .net 6 #64672
  • Managed debugger does not hit breakpoints on callbacks from native thread #64668
  • Logging Source Generator fails to detect event name uniqueness within a class scope #64667
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile when `out` parameter modifier is present #64665
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use emscripten workload packs instead of a local provisioned emsdk to build the runtime #64660
  • Dynamic PGO work planned for .NET 7 #64659
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Interlocked.CompareExchange for byte/short/sbyte/ushort #64658
  • AccessViolationException in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Json_FromString<MyEventsListerViewModel>.Jil_ benchmark #64657
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main .NET 5, validation-runtime-.NET 5, runtime #runtime-101517-.NET5 #57251
    5.0.x
  • [wasm] debuger test failures on CI #62964
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Update two debugger tests, as they are invalid now #63560
  • debuggertests.harnesstests.debuggertests.harnesstests.exceptionthrown #64483
  • [API Proposal]: DbDataReader.GetDateOnly and DbDataReader.GetTimeOnly #62135
  • Continue evolving System.Data and the database providers #48253
    6.0.0
  • Race condition in MemoryCache will crash the process #61032
    6.0.x
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails if [Required(ErrorMessage = "...")] attribute is present. #62937
    7.0.0
  • Incorrect nullable annotation for ValidationAttribute.IsValid overload #63147
  • Visual Studio 2022 : Extension code C# - JsonContent.CreateContent no longer works #63063
    7.0.0
  • VS 2022 preview 2.1: Blazor WebAssembly debugging can't move current cursor when paused #64475
  • Prevent placing ref fields on non-pointer boundaries #64520
    7.0.0
  • How to detect or prevent HTTPS endpoint fallback to Http #64029
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile when `in` parameter modifier is present #62644
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile due to CS0246 and CS0265 errors if type for generic constraint is in a different namespace #58550
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails ungracefully with overloaded methods #61814
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move explicit coverage entry points into separate public classes #64708
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Clean up remaining tests under JIT/Methodical using Environment.Exit #64706
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fixes two logging source gen bugs - when using "in" or "ref" modifier / when dealing with constraints #64705
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [release/6.0] Fixes bad log method generation in certain cases. #64704
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Use ordinal comparison for known header values #64702
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Use SSA def VNs to determine legality of copy propagation (instead of tree VNs) #64701
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix racy page reload test #64695
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Update Maui Workload Install Process for Perf #64692
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix test build command in docs/workflow/building/coreclr/nativeaot.md #64690
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Enable regions again. #64688
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Merge release/6.0-maui branch back into release/6.0 #64687
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow, 6.0.3
  • Compile coreclr\dlls folder with PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT #64684
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix too wide memory accesses for nullchecks #64683
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #55822 Disable CanRecurseFrom root for Android #64682
    area-System.IO
  • Add easyway possibility to replace a specific Implementation in ServiceCollection #64681
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [Android] Workaround for invalid return value from clock_nanosleep #64679
    os-android, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add Nullable.GetValueRefOrDefaultRef API #64677
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consume renamed TargetFramework package #64670
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Logging Source Generator - Adds support to `@` signed prefixed parameters #64663
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Allow ConfigBinder to bind arrays to Singular elements #64656
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

Merged

  • Allow use of overloaded methods when using LoggerMessage #64573
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Fixes two logging source gen bugs - when using "in" or "ref" modifier / when dealing with constraints #64593
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Update windows helix queues #64699
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-maui] Bump emsdk version #64691
    area-Build-mono
  • Add notes about ignored checks to superpmi-asmdiffs and enterprise-linux pipelines #64685
    area-Infrastructure
  • Begin using the xplat hardware intrinsics in BitArray #63722
    area-System.Collections
  • Revert emscripten bump temporarily #64664
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix some flaky tests #64652
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete InternalModuleBuilder and InternalAssemblyBuilder #64662
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Member resolving fix for derived attributes (#62937) #63837
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Avoid downcasting NewSize #64661
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to Set Next Instruction Pointer. #64114
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Logging Source Generator - Remove extra blank space with generated code #64666
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Disable Vector256 tests which are timing out #64653
  • Fix some nullability warnings in NativeAOT CoreLib #64404
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add tests for `ref` field overlap with OBJECTREF and non-aligned `ref` fields. #64643
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Change message for uncompilable methods #64669
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable a few ECKeyFileTests on Android 31 and later #64533
    area-System.Security
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` for "boxed statics" #63845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Avoid an assert in ves_icall_RuntimeFieldInfo_SetValueInternal #64214
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add xarch `andn` #64350
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Ignore exit code returned from the merged wrappers #64651
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Writeup on OSR Details and Debugging #64428
  • Remove unused variable, fix typos #64542
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix debugger initialization #64523
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm] Enable WasmTemplateTests on CI #64589
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: simple forward substitution pass #63720
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Emscripten 2.0.34 bump #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use global caching in JsonSerializerOptions #64646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Handle ((IAsyncResult)task).AsyncWaitHandle.Dispose better in task completion #64627
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [resubmit] BigInteger parsing optimization for large decimal string #55121
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Import string.Empty as "" #64530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add JIT support for control-flow guard on x64 and arm64 #63763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [draft][wasm] InvokeJSFunctionByName alternate design #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • vtable setup fix for generic default interface methods in mono runtime #64102
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Add support for `TYP_BYREF` `LCL_FLD`s to VN #64501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move DllImportGenerator to use DisableRuntimeMarshalling for its blittable classification #64279
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update mac Helix queues #64565
  • Better default for L3 cache size on win-arm64 and lin-arm64 #64645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use generic math in System.Numerics.Vectors (#60365) #60905
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution #54063
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Pass IV through cipher resets for OpenSSL and Android #64641
    area-System.Security
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #64642
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/include/mono-2.0 #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.3 #64644
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Inject RegexGeneratorAttribute from the generator #64229
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add IAsyncEnumerable support to TransformManyBlock #49264
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Validate behavior of ProcessInfo command before and after suspension point #63382
    test enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Add S.S.C.Cose with COSE Sign1 support #64461
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make sure that StressLogAnalyzer works with filtering 64 bit addresses #64594
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Don't show the wasm functions on callstack when debugging managed code #64223
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wip] Run tests on newer Android #64341
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix mono native warnings from wasm targets #64650
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64648
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixed debugger attachment to a project with special characters in the path. #64527
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Throw PNSE if insufficient privileges when custom Ping payload was specified #64625
    area-System.Net
  • Explicit test for injecting scoped IServiceProvider into scoped and transient services (#63225) #63226
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix ReadyToRun loading on Apple Silicon #64104
    Servicing-consider, area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, community-contribution, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixing race condition #64394
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Move MacCatalyst to runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #64452
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update Android to r23b image #64567
  • Unify reading from procfs to get network related information #63696
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • Implement TLS1.3 delayed client cert requests on Linux #64268
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Improve `fgValueNumberBlockAssignment` #64110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Expand System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support the APIs required by Xamarin #64556
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #62740
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • NetworkAddressChange.Unix: use async Socket API to wait for events. #64614
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Implement ICustomMarshaler #160

Updated

  • Direct PInvoke Calls with static lib seems not working for NativeAOT-LLVM WebAssembly? #1842
  • Is it possible to include the c source file in csproj instead of statically linking against a unmanaged library? #1841
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: Is GetCryptographicallySecureRandomBytes allowed to block #1844

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Change importance of missing EMSDK Message task to High so it appears on the console #1846

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add support for GT_INDEX_ADDR #1824
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM]: Initial support for IsVirtualVtable calls #1768
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] map runtimeimports to their native name for ldftn #1843

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • App has reference to PresentationFramework and System.Windows.Forms while it doesn't use them #23721
  • Community feedback survey #23708
    Discussion

Closed

  • Intermittent Workload CLI errors: 'Number of entries expected in End of Central Directory...' #20849
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump System.Net.Http from 4.3.2 to 4.3.4 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/11TestAppWith10CLIToolReferences #23726
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump System.Net.Http from 4.3.0 to 4.3.4 in /src/Tests/Msbuild.Tests.Utilities #23725
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Blame switch args should not swallow following arg #23722
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Ensure properties are escaped with double quotes #23720
    Area-DotNet Test

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23532
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix incremental in RunProduceContentAssets target. #23656
  • Cherry pick build config changes #23685
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use Component.SdkAnalyzers for 6.0 and earlier apps #23723
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update branding to 5.0.406 #23702
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't split collect command into multiple collect commands (#22666) #23696
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.103 #23703
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update application insights version #22974
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23604
    Area-Infrastructure
  • fix dotnet run infinite loop by rendering help explicitly #23688
    Area-Tools

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Update utf8-string-literals.md based on LDM-2022-01-26.md #5714

Updated

  • Update required members spec #5688

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bad fix for param-nullchecking involving #if directive #59227
  • Null-checking nullable param warning should be relaxed #59226
  • Adjust generic null-checking codegen for clarity #59223
    17.2
  • Syntactic-sugar indexers with Index and Range don't use implicit conversion, but range operator does? #59222
  • Repo Survey (2022 Edition) #59221
    17.2
  • ServiceHub fails to share CompilationTracker instances or otherwise synchronize dependent project parsing #59218
    17.2
  • AD0001 (analyzer threw exception) diagnostics don't appear in error list #59214
    17.2

Closed

  • <autogenerated>causes nullable variable to be incorrectly reported as "is not null" #59173
  • Postconditions on user-defined conversion parameters are not respected #49575
    Compiler.Next
  • Annotations do not work for user defined conversion operators #32671
    Compiler.Next
  • Missing "CS8656: Call to non-readonly member from a 'readonly' member results in an implicit copy of 'this'" warning on inner field method calls #36794
    Compiler.Next
  • [LSP] Go to Definition doesn't support source link (or decompilation) #58702
    Backlog
  • XML Documents for Positional Records #52663
    17.2
  • Visual Studio 2022 crashes for certain solution after setting net6.0 instead of net5.0 #59190
  • Test plan for "raw string literals" #55306
    17.2
  • Use argument types to guide Signature Help #6713
    Backlog
  • FixAllProvider doesn't support more than two fixes with some identical insertions #59130
    Backlog
  • VS2019 and VS2022 Roslyn / SDK incompatible #59156
  • Capture source generator statistics #59176
  • Compiler should optimize conversion from bool? to bool when code tests for true #39409
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for StringSyntaxAttribute with json/regex/datetime literals. #59225
    Area-IDE
  • Handle param null check with else clause #59224
    Area-IDE
  • Enable keyword highlighting in LSP #59215
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Removes Bing search link from diagnostic data #59212
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59208
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #59207
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Break out navigate-to specific index components into a separate index. #59206
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle nullable annotations on user defined operators and conversions #59169
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Refactor ISyntaxInputNodes #58800
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Remove dependency on EditorFeatures from Remote.ServiceHub project - take 2 #59147
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move workspace file removal to BG to avoid UI delay #59211
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update publish data for 17.1 #59153
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow full source from metadata and decompilation in LSP #59217
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Revert "Correctly handle additional inputs to user-defined conversions (#58730)" (#59148)" #59220
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Use record param docs as property summary docs #58960
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Don't require services from the VS layer that aren't present on VS Mac #59210
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Razor snippets #58857
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Add refactoring to convert normal (or verbatim) strings to raw strings. #59180
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Do not use SyntaxWalker to visit an arbitrary syntax tree in order to avoid a stack overflow. #59203
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Add external access API for find usages #59144
    Area-IDE, Next
  • AddImportPlacementOptions #59028
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update 3rd party usages that came in from json parsing. #59188
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update to Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Testing 1.1.1-beta1.22081.4 #59181
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Make sure Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Collections builds with net6.0 #57665
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge features/RawStringLiterals to main #59182
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Next
  • Update analyzer-suggestion.md #59213
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Address a few param-nullchecking feedback items #59200
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove Roslyn.Hosting.Diagnostics.csproj #59167
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • QuickInfo and Completion options follow-up #59170
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable feature lightup on json strings (classification, bracematching, diagnostics). #59034
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1586394 #59216
    auto-merge
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringsLiterals #59204
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Features/rename_UI_rework Merge Main #59201
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Support declaration and emit of `required` members in source #58507
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers
  • Move FunctionIdOptions to EditorFeatures #59166
    Area-IDE
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Make CompletionOptions global #59117
    Area-IDE
  • Go To Implementation show metadata results #59100
    Area-IDE
  • Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Remove netstandard1.3 from code base #59177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • CompletionService refactoring and small tweaks to import completion #59125
    Area-IDE
  • Remove places where the compiler is swallowing exceptions #58870
    Area-Compilers
  • Support Pattern Matching ReadOnlySpan<char> on constant string #44388
    Area-Compilers, Community, Compiler.Next
  • Don't block completion for items from unimported namespaces #59045
    Area-IDE
  • Move global options to EditorFeature layer #59071
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide documentation to use Owin correctly with ASP.NET Core #39943
    .NET 7 Planning
  • OpenID Connect correlation cookie and changes to SameSite=None Cookie-Handling #39941
    Backlog
  • FileBufferingReadStream - CanRead and CanSeek should return !_disposed #39939
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Survey: Repo Contribution Experience 2022 #39936
    Discussions
  • Blazor WASM Lazy Loading with App Bundling #39935
  • Blazor Hybrid validation cases #39933
    7.0-preview2
  • [Blazor server] On demand principal revalidation #39932
    Backlog
  • FallbackPolicy takes precedence over AuthorizeFilters added using Conventions #39930
  • Blazor server side, NavigationManager.NavigateTo not checking AuthenticationState #39929

Closed

  • Authorize attribute with JWT token is checked only when connection is made on websocket #39934
  • SignalR HttpContext access #39894
  • Should `failureMessage` in `AuthenticateResult` be nullable? #39916
  • [Blazor wasm, auth] 404 Static files downloading from /authentication #39876
  • HttpLoggingMiddleware doesn't always log request body #39911
  • Window Authentication in Linux .net core #39816
  • With .NET 7 SDK, the docs link should be updated when creating mvc/razor project in CLI #39862
    7.0-preview1
  • Inferring `FromServices` optionality based on nullability information #39757
    7.0-preview2

PullRequests

Created

  • Also build `npm` projects in parallel #39945
    area-infrastructure
  • Fire an event when allowing a bad request #39944
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • RazorPages: Save an allocation in PageRequestDelegateFactory #39942
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fixed misleading CookieOptions.HttpOnly summary #39937
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update branding to 5.0.15 #39923
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.15
  • [release/5.0] Improve File access issues #39732
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.15
  • [release/6.0] [SignalR] Only minify .min.js files #39859
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Don't reference test asset projects in Build.props #39733
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Allow runtime compilation to be configured via the hosting startup. #39639
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.3
  • Fix typo in localization file #39633
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.3
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies for dotnet 5 #39464
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Use 1ES machines for official builds #39683
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor MAUI: Controls in BlazorWebView use the device's culture and not an application configured culture #4484
  • Blazor FileInput is not working on Android #4483
  • Shadows disappear after navigating to different page #4480
  • Run MAUI app on M1 Mac without Rosetta 2 #4477
  • Run MAUI app on M1 Mac without Rosetta 2 #4476
  • Compiling on m1 arm64 yields x64 app #4475
  • XAML Hot Reload is not working on Blazor MAUI apps #4474
  • Repo Participation / Contribution Community Survey #4473
  • [Bug] Shadow effect not showing in WinUI #4471
  • Localization via satellite assemblies doesn't work for android when the app built in debug mode. #4470
  • [iOS] MSB4044: The "GetMlaunchArguments" task was not given a value for the required parameter "AppBundlePath". #4469
  • Descriptive error if you attempt to run app from unsupported platform combination #4462

Closed

  • Showstopper for those that use MongoDB Realm nuget package (and maybe others) #4427

PullRequests

Created

  • Async commands with no CommandMapper changes #4482
  • Remove `IPlatformInvalidate` and `Device.Invalidate()` #4479
  • Remove Device.Flags/SetFlags() #4478
  • Shapes Handlers #4472

  • Refactor PhoneDialer into interface #4466
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Refactor DeviceInfo to use an interface #4465
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Refactor AppInfo into interface #4464
    6.0.300-preview.14

Merged

  • Add microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain back into the rollback.json #4481
  • Ensure that using the AndExpand Grid hack doesn't null out BindingContext #4455
  • Fix Path for MacCatalyst/macOS apps #4463
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4461
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1760 #2763
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨

Updated

  • [Blazor] Add missing RootComponentCollectionExtensions to Wpf and Maui #4384
  • [Windows] Implement Border properties in RadioButtonHandler #4416
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • Don't force a min size of zero for controls #4422
  • Initial work to get unpackaged WinUI apps #4460
  • Implement WebView navigation events #4443
    area/controls 🎮
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Generate the Windows manifests as well #2704
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Survey: GitHub contributor experience for dotnet/efcore #27348
    Discussions
  • Nullable String with Unique Index Converted to Empty String #27347
  • Default value "HasDefaultValueSql" not working as expected. #27346
  • ArgumentException thrown When GroupJoin is applied on a DbSet as a first join and NOT when applied as a second or later #27343
  • Validate that GetContainingPropertyName() is null iff IsDocumentRoot() #27342
  • Better handling of default value in inherited Base entity in DbContext #27341
  • Allow value generation on some composite FK properties #27340

Closed

  • Redundant queries when using OUTER APPLY #27349
  • Why do IQueryables produced by methods other than OrderBy(Descending) satisfy the `is IOrderedQueryable` condition? #27330
  • Support IMutableNavigation.SetJsonPropertyName/IReadOnlyNavigation.GetJsonPropertyName - CosmosDB Provider #27328
  • I am not sure the problem comes from efcore or .net sdk #27311
  • Setting a Nullable Foreign Key property to Null triggers cascade delete #27174
    6.0.3
  • EF Core adds an Id column for foreign key relation although foreign key is provided explicitely #27315

PullRequests

Created

  • Issue 27301 - Optimizer hangs on properties implementing a referential collection #27350
  • Cosmos: Add IS_DEFINED() function to cosmos provider #27344

Merged

  • Remove quirks. #27345
  • [release/6.0] Fix to #27072 - Suboptimal SQL generation for query with optional navigation, its collection navigation and lateral join #27302
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Query: Convert single result subquery comparison to null to Any operation #27284
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] RevEng: Don't use nameof syntax (#26622) #27231
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [release/6.0] Store ApplicationServiceProvider in a WeakReference #27190
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27338
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27337
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27336
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Revert change to delete dependent when optional FK with cascade delete is set to null #27216
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Query: Match correct predicate structure to convert apply to join #27292
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.3
